publications.title: Responsible Visualization Design for Environmental Data
publications.venue: IEEE Trans. Visualization & Comp. Graphics (Proc. VIS)
publications.abstract: This paper presents a framework for designing environmentally responsible data visualizations that consider the ecological impact of digital systems while maintaining effective communication of environmental data.

publications.title: Urban Data Literacy: Empowering Communities Through Accessible Visualizations
publications.venue: Proc. ACM Human Factors in Computing Systems (CHI)
publications.abstract: We explore how accessible data visualizations can empower urban communities to engage with city data and participate in decision-making processes.

publications.title: Tangible Visualizations for Climate Change Communication
publications.abstract: This work investigates how tangible, off-screen visualizations can effectively communicate climate change data using sustainable materials and interactive elements.

publications.title: Bridging Global South and North: Collaborative Visualization Research
publications.abstract: We present insights from international collaboration in visualization research, highlighting the importance of diverse perspectives and equitable partnerships.

publications.title: Data Stories from the Amazon: Visualizing Environmental Justice
publications.abstract: This paper presents a case study of using data visualization to tell stories about environmental justice in the Amazon region, combining scientific data with community narratives.

publications.title: Accessible Dashboards for Public Health Data
publications.abstract: We design and evaluate accessible dashboard interfaces for public health data, ensuring that critical health information is available to diverse populations.
